<<<<<<< HEAD
A narration of the life of Mr. Henry Burton. Wherein is set forth the various and remarkable passages thereof, his sufferings, supports, comforts, and deliverances. Now published for the benefit of all those that either doe or may suffer for the cause of Christ. According to a copy written with his owne hand. Burton, Henry, 1578-1648.
[4], 51, [1] p., [1] leaf of plates : port.
[s.n], London : Printed in the Yeare, 1643.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 27". Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
=======
